asu.name: Arizona State University
asu.degree: Bachelors of Science in Technological Entrepreneurship and Management
asu.description: Focused on entrepreneurship and management in existing and emerging technology fields. Received a foundation in technology and business fundamentals, with an emphasis on entrepreneurship and innovation in areas such as: operations management, process innovation and process improvement, product development, and social entrepreneurship.

flatiron.name: Flatiron Schools Bootcamp
flatiron.description: Explored software engineering with various concepts including, but not limited to: objected-oriented programming, data structures, API development, single page applications, and more. Some technologies we used include: Ruby, Sinatra, Rails, JavaScript, React, Node.js, SQL, and more.
